programme.title: NC State @ Duke
programme.desc: The Blue Devils try to complete a perfect slate at Cameron Indoor Stadium by hosting the Wolfpack. Duke has won four in a row, but looks to avenge an 84-60 loss at NC State on Jan. 4. Duke has a half-game lead over NC State for the ACC's fifth seed.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 3 Jayhawks welcome a test from the Red Raiders. Texas Tech had a four-game win streak snapped and potentially its March Madness hopes dashed, following a one-point setback to then-No. 24 TCU on Feb. 25. Kansas has won its past six contests.

programme.title: Yankees-Dodgers: An Uncivil War
programme.desc: In 1977 and 1978, the New York Yankees and Los Angeles Dodgers squared off in back-to-back World Series. This ESPN Films documentary tells the story of a rivalry filled with colorful characters, seismic controversies and unforgettable moments.

programme.title: Texas @ TCU
programme.desc: The Horned Frogs (13-3, 3-2 Big 12) host the Longhorns (14-5, 4-3). Texas seeks a sixth straight win versus TCU, as well as an end to a two-game road skid. TCU is 7-1 at home, with the only blemish coming to Baylor, and topped Iowa State on Jan. 22.

programme.title: On This Day
